item.title: Regular Expression Syntax Highlighting [UNSOLVED]
item.description: The Problem When posting snippets of regular expression code inside code blocks (as in this example) it would be helpful to apply syntax highlighting. Because this site uses Hugo, which uses Chroma, which does not yet include support for highlighting regular expressions another approach is required. The Process A web search for regular expression syntax highlighting returned some discussions of the general question: Is there a good syntax highlighting hint for regular expressions?
